product_description.description: Ready-mix concrete is produced at batching plants where controlled operations allow precise mix designs resulting in a product that is delivered to construction sites in a freshly mixed, plastic, or unhardened state.
product_description.substances_of_concern: The product does not contain one or more substances that are listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for Authorisation.

raw_materials: Secondary Materials (fly ash, silica fume, GGBFS)
manufacturing_process_flow.packaging: Holcim ready-mix concrete is delivered in bulk with no packaging.

recycled_materials.recycled_materials_used: There is no recycled materials used in producing the product.

impact_categories_calculated_manually: Use of renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PERM)
Use of non-renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PENRM)

data_quality.foreground_data_source: Primary source by Holcim (NZ) for January 2022 - December 2022
data_quality.generic_data: Generic data from LCA databases used for raw materials
data_quality.exceptions: Supplier product-specific EPDs incorporated where available

included_modules: A1 - Extraction and production of primary raw materials
system_boundary.notes: Emissions from construction installation (A5) excluded due to no operational control; distribution (A4) and use stages (B1-B7) excluded.

principles: Divide system sub-processes and collect input/output data
Partition inputs and outputs based on physical relationships
If physical relationships insufficient, allocate based on economic value
allocation.application: Allocation based on annual production volume by m³; fuel consumption for mixing/loading measured per declared unit without allocation.

cut_off_rules.minimum_inflows_included: 95% of total inflows (mass and energy) per module
cut_off_rules.minimum_energy_use_included: 99% of renewable and non-renewable primary energy use
exclusions: Environmental impact from infrastructure, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
cut_off_rules.packaging: Packaging excluded except for raw material packaging which is excluded for simplicity

key_assumptions.emission_factors: Most assigned are generic; supplier-specific to replace when available
key_assumptions.transport_distances: Estimated average distances used where data unavailable
key_assumptions.GreenStar_and_IS_indicators: Included for future reporting; transport impacts for cement product use generic data

transport.raw_material_transport: All materials transported via truck; aggregates and cements by heavy trucks, other raw materials by medium trucks
transport.waste_transport: Transport of materials for landfilling externally included
transport.deconstruction_transport_distance: 50 km from construction site to landfill

installation.notes: Emissions from construction installation (A5) excluded as Holcim (NZ) does not have operational control

end_of_life.deconstruction: Assumed to use drilling to break and remove concrete
end_of_life.waste_processing: No recycling assumed; C3 impact is zero
end_of_life.disposal: All products assumed to be landfilled (C4)
end_of_life.carbonation: No carbonation at end of life
end_of_life.recycling: No recycling for the product at end of life

recycled_materials_handling.allocation_method: Impacts allocated according to PCR 2019:14 for co-produced goods, multi-output allocation

contact_information.address: 23 Plumer Street, Central Auckland 1010, New Zealand

disclaimers: Results of some environmental impact indicators shall be used with care due to high uncertainties or limited experience.
Ionising radiation impact category excludes nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal effects.
